name: intel-briefing
description: Intelligence briefing system for continuous document analysis and forecasting. Ingest YouTube videos, URLs, articles, PDFs, and text files. Track content creators and discover new intelligence via automated scouting. Generate cumulative master briefings with validated claims across four pillars: financial markets, geopolitics, AI & technology, and labor markets. Track prediction accuracy with Brier scores and export to HTML, PDF, and Markdown.
